title: Hope Shines Through Community Exhibition
deck: An exhibition to celebrate the creativity that has emerged during lockdown.
article:
Friday 6th & Saturday 7th November

10am - 4pm at the Gateway Centre

We are putting together an exhibition to celebrate the creativity that has emerged during lockdown.

We need your contributions - all ages and abilities welcome. 

Painting, crafts, knitting, sewing, poetry and more...

**HOW TO ENTER**

Please email a photo of your creative work to exhibition@gatewaychurch.co.uk **by 9th October**. If accepted, we will let you know how to safely drop it off for the display.
